segments.text: I notice the sunlight highlighting the garden through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems at peace, carefully tending to her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, the faucet's running wild, overflowing the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascades down, forming a puddle she's standing in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's adventure on the stool is thrilling to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies so boldly from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister looks eager, reaching for her reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit risky with the stool tilting, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The clear counter gives him just enough space.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked dishes wait patiently by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic scene has a touch of excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool holds; it would be a shame if it didn't.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tied-back curtains frame it all nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR
